Automate constructions, recruit troops, send resources, cast spells and keep your account active with performance and security. Created by experienced players, it allows configuration by city groups and full customization.

For the 3 options below, set the time 5s earlier if used during sieges.
The bot will spam the spell for 10s starting from the chosen time, e.g. 10:10:10 will spam from 10:10:10 to 10:10:20. If the siege is at 10:10:10, set 10:10:05, so it runs from 10:10:05 to 10:10:15. This gives 5s safety for possible PC time delays.
